message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: Authors: Jordi Conesa and Antoni Oliv√©
Given
a base ontology Ob
set of concepts of direct interest CoI
G(CoI) as CoI + their generalizations
then the prunned ontology Op can be obtained by
Step 1 (Prune irrelevant concepts & constraints): O1 = Ob - unrelevant concepts & contraints of G(CoI)
Step 2 (Prune unnecessary parents): O2 = O1 - unnecessary parents
Step 3 (Prune unnecessary generalization paths): O3 = O2 - unnecessary generalization paths
Step 4 (Prune orphans individuals): Op = O3 - orphans individuals
speaker: SYSTEM
